CBlockAllocator
template <typename T>
CBlockAllocator

A simple block allocator for creating lots of objects that are the same size.

Functions
CBlockAllocator
CBlockAllocator(
int defaultBlockSize
)

Constructor

Parameters
defaultBlockSize
int

size of each object allocated by this block allocator

Allocate
T *Allocate()

Allocates and returns a new object

Free

T *p
)

Frees an object previously allocated by Allocate()
